name: The Hermit

texts.title: The Tarot: A Key to the Wisdom of the Ages
texts.author: Paul Foster Case

daimon.name: Inner Lamp Bearer
daimon.invocation: I seek wisdom in solitude, carrying the inner light for others to follow.

invocation: May I find the light within and share it wisely with those who seek truth.

manifest.intention: Cultivate inner wisdom through solitary practice and tarot study
manifest.technique: Meditation, tarot contemplation, and hermetic analysis
